summary: Integration test suite for the PLBart English tokenizer, verifying correct handling of language codes, token masking, batch encoding/decoding, truncation, special token preservation, compatibility with Fairseq batch parity, and proper operation in translation and seq2seq scenarios.
business_intent: Ensure the PLBart English tokenizer functions reliably in production translation and sequence-to-sequence pipelines, maintaining token integrity, language code management, and model compatibility across saving/loading and batch processing.
